*Encryption process*

A basic example of the encryption process using the binary mode.

{{{
<?php
require_once 'Crypt.class.php';

$Crypt = new Crypt;
$Crypt->Mode = CRYPT_MODE_BINARY;
$Crypt->Key  = 'foo';
echo $encrypted = $Crypt->Encrypt('bar');
echo $Crypt->Decrypt($encrypted);
?>
}}}

*Hashing process*

A basic example of the hashing process using the SHA1 hash algorithm.

{{{
<?php
require_once 'Crypt.class.php';

$Crypt = new Crypt;
$Crypt->Hash = CRYPT_HASH_SHA1;
$Crypt->Key  = 'foo';
echo $hash = $Crypt->Hash('bar');
echo (int) $hash === $Crypt->Hash('bar');
?>
}}}
